title: Snorg

| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A particularly corpulent troll with a short temper and a sizable gut. Uninterested in the Orb, Snorg delights in the endless parade of adventurers – that is, easy meals — it attracts. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)

## Useful Info

**Snorg the Insatiable** is a ferocious [unique](/Unique "Unique") [troll](/Troll_\(monster\) "Troll (monster)") who hits hard in melee and goes [berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") with reckless abandon.

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"): 10-14
- [The Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"): 3-6
- [The Orcish Mines](/The_Orcish_Mines "The Orcish Mines")

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                    |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Berserker Rage](/Berserker_Rage "Berserker Rage") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Going into melee against Snorg can be dangerous. Her berserk usually lasts longer than yours, hasting her and increasing the damage of her attacks by 1.5x (for an average damage/time increase of 2.25x). Summoners can spam cheap summoned monsters, letting them take her attacks and softening her up until her berserk expires. Extremely fast characters can [kite](/Kite "Kite") her, though this usually isn't an option ([Haste](/Haste "Haste") + better than average base move speed required). Those who want to engage her in melee should buff themselves first: a [potion of haste](/Potion_of_haste "Potion of haste") and a [potion of might](/Potion_of_might "Potion of might") will not go amiss. High defensive stats certainly also help.
- Snorg goes berserk more often when she's wounded. If you can't handle her berserking, it's best to either kill or disable her quickly or run away without hurting her.
- Killing Snorg may produce a named [troll leather armour](/Troll_leather_armour "Troll leather armour") that has a chance to come pre-enchanted.
html:
Snorg

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.25: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all trolls, see list of trolls.

Snorg T 
HP 63-128
HD 8
XP 1135
Speed 10
AC 0
EV 10
Will 60
Attack1 20 (bite: plain)
Attack2 15 (claw: plain)
Attack3 15 (claw: plain)
Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type troll, troll
Flags Regenerates
Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
A particularly corpulent troll with a short temper and a sizable gut. Uninterested in the Orb, Snorg delights in the endless parade of adventurers – that is, easy meals — it attracts.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks

Useful Info

Snorg the Insatiable is a ferocious unique troll who hits hard in melee and goes berserk with reckless abandon.

Location

  • The Dungeon: 10-14
  • The Lair: 3-6
  • The Orcish Mines

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Berserker Rage Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Going into melee against Snorg can be dangerous. Her berserk usually lasts longer than yours, hasting her and increasing the damage of her attacks by 1.5x (for an average damage/time increase of 2.25x). Summoners can spam cheap summoned monsters, letting them take her attacks and softening her up until her berserk expires. Extremely fast characters can kite her, though this usually isn't an option (Haste + better than average base move speed required). Those who want to engage her in melee should buff themselves first: a potion of haste and a potion of might will not go amiss. High defensive stats certainly also help.
  • Snorg goes berserk more often when she's wounded. If you can't handle her berserking, it's best to either kill or disable her quickly or run away without hurting her.
  • Killing Snorg may produce a named troll leather armour that has a chance to come pre-enchanted.

==Useful Info==
'''Snorg the Insatiable''' is a ferocious [[unique]] [[troll (monster)|troll]] who hits hard in melee and goes [[berserk]] with reckless abandon.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]: 10-14
*[[The Lair]]: 3-6
*[[The Orcish Mines]]

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Going into melee against Snorg can be dangerous. Her berserk usually lasts longer than yours, hasting her and increasing the damage of her attacks by 1.5x (for an average damage/time increase of 2.25x). Summoners can spam cheap summoned monsters, letting them take her attacks and softening her up until her berserk expires. Extremely fast characters can [[kite]] her, though this usually isn't an option ([[Haste]] + better than average base move speed required). Those who want to engage her in melee should buff themselves first: a [[potion of haste]] and a [[potion of might]] will not go amiss. High defensive stats certainly also help.
*Snorg goes berserk more often when she's wounded. If you can't handle her berserking, it's best to either kill or disable her quickly or run away without hurting her.
*Killing Snorg may produce a named [[troll leather armour]] that has a chance to come pre-enchanted.

[[Category:Troll]]
